# Change Impact Canvas

Use this canvas when evaluating a change request against ISO/IEC/IEEE 29148 clause 7.2.5 traceability requirements.

## Change summary
- **Request ID & owner:**
- **Description:**
- **Reason / source:** (stakeholder, regulation, defect)
- **Priority & deadline:**

## Impact assessment
| Area | Questions to answer | Findings |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Requirements | Which IDs are touched? Do new IDs need to be minted? | |
| Stakeholders | Does intent/conflict change? Who must re-approve? | |
| Interfaces & constraints | Which external systems, clauses, or contracts are impacted? | |
| Verification/validation | Which methods/evidence must update? | |
| Schedule & baselines | What artifacts or reviews need re-baselining? | |

## Decision log
- **Recommended action:** approve / defer / reject
- **Conditions / mitigations:**
- **Decision owner:**
- **Next checkpoints:**

> Remember to update the traceability matrix and validation protocol if the change is approved.
